entry.tran: 一心一意的;专心致志的
entry.def: Someone who is single-minded has only one aim or purpose and is determined to achieve it.

example.ex: They were effective politicians, ruthless and single-minded in their pursuit of political power.
example.tran: 他们都是些非常现实的政治家，一心追逐政治权力，为达目的毫不留情。
